verses.verse: «A Song of degrees.» Behold, bless ye the LORD, all [ye] You who are Levites and chiefly appointed to this office. servants of the LORD, which by night stand in the house of the LORD.
Lift up your For their charge was not only to keep the temple, but to pray there and to give God thanks. hands [in] the sanctuary, and bless the LORD.

The LORD that And therefore has all power, bless you with his fatherly love declared in Zion. Thus the Levites used to praise the Lord, and bless the people. made heaven and earth bless thee out of Zion.
